      • G3View

        public G3View(int[][] mazeMatrix,
              double heightOfRectangle,
              double widthRectangle,
              double playerXPos,
              double playerYPos,
              double width,
              double height,
              long currentTimer)
        Construcotr for the last Game
        Parameters:
        mazeMatrix - int[][], the matrix for the maze
        heightOfRectangle - double, height of the rectangle for the blogs of the maze
        widthRectangle - double, width of the rectangle for the blogs of the maze
        playerXPos - double, X position of the player
        playerYPos - double, Y position of the player
        width - double, width of the Screen
        height - double, height of the Screen
        currentTimer - long, timer for this game

                   java.util.ArrayList<Probe> probeList,

                   long currentTime)
        update the player animation and probe animations.
        Parameters:
        playerXpos - double, X position of Player
        playerYpos - double, Y position of Player
        playerDirection - Enum.Direction, holds the different directions
        probeList - ArrayList<Probe>, holds the different probes
        numProbes - int, the number of probes, we have
        currentTime - long, the remaining time
